title: Did the officer of the armed school stop shooting at the Arabo school?
subtitle: In some key respects, it is inaccurate to have a graph of the shooting of a school in Araphu in 2013 that was banned by an armed school resource officer.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: In December 2015, an armed school resource officer circumvented a shooting incident in a school in Arbaho district, Colorado.
